homepage.nanina_explanation: Nanina is a browser gacha game with the objective of providing an alternative non skill based progression system to rhythm games. Enjoy playing rhythm games even when you reached your skill cap!
homepage.nanina_objective: The objective is to get characters from various media, obtain XP by playing a rhythm game, improve their stats for doing various tasks and clearing dungeons to get gear. Optimize your party and their equipment to progress through the game and compete with other players, while playing and getting better at rhythms games!
homepage.nanina_supported_games: For now the only supported game is osu! standard with the other three osu gamemodes comming soon!

nanina_help.open_source: It's a completely free and open source project with no microtransactions. If you want to, you can participate by :
nanina_help.support_games: Adding support for not yet supported rhythm games.
nanina_help.help: Simply by helping with the developpement of the project!

homepage.wiki_link: Click here to see a detailed explaination of the mechanics of the game.

privacy_policy.data_collection_body: On account registration, we only collect your discord username. As you play Nanina, we collect various information on how you are using the website.
privacy_policy.use_of_data_body: Collected data is used to improve the website and for analytics purposes.
privacy_policy.data_protection_body: Data protection is important to us, Nanina follows standards procedures to protect your data.
privacy_policy.cookies_body: We use cookies only to maintain login credentials across multiple sessions. If you refuse to those conditions, please do not use the website.
privacy_policy.sharing_data_body: We do not share your data with third parties, except as required by law.
privacy_policy.your_rights_body: As a user, you have the right to request access or delet your data by contacting us at: {mail}
privacy_policy.contact_us_body: If you have any questions, please contact us at: {mail}
